languages.text: "Впрочем, вижу, скоро ты станешь очень послушным образцом. Конвульсивные спазмы, истерические реакции... Иди-ка сюда". {n}Существо тыкает вас пальцем в грудь, и треугольный ноготь легко проникает под кожу. Странный звук бьется на границе сознания. Звук, похожий на ваш собственный крик.{/n}

"But I see you will soon become a very obedient specimen. Convulsive spasms, hysterical reactions... Come here." {n}The creature pokes you in the chest, its triangular fingernail easily penetrating your skin. A strange sound throbs at the edge of your awareness. A sound similar to your own scream.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Впрочем, вижу, скоро ты станешь очень послушным образцом. Конвульсивные спазмы, истерические реакции... Иди-ка сюда". {n}Существо тыкает вас пальцем в грудь, и треугольный ноготь легко проникает под кожу. Странный звук бьется на границе сознания. Звук, похожий на ваш собственный крик.{/n}

Come here." {n}The creature pokes you in the chest, its triangular fingernail easily penetrating your skin. A strange sound throbs at the edge of your awareness. A sound similar to your own scream.{/n}

"But I see you will soon become a very obedient specimen. Convulsive spasms, hysterical reactions... Come here." {n}The creature pokes you in the chest, its triangular fingernail easily penetrating your skin. A strange sound throbs at the edge of your awareness. A sound similar to your own scream.{/n}

"But I see you will soon become a very obedient specimen. Convulsive spasms, hysterical reactions... Come here." {n}The creature pokes you in the chest, its triangular fingernail easily penetrating your skin. A strange sound throbs at the edge of your awareness. A sound similar to your own scream.{/n}

"But I see you will soon become a very obedient specimen. Convulsive spasms, hysterical reactions... Come here." {n}The creature pokes you in the chest, its triangular fingernail easily penetrating your skin. A strange sound throbs at the edge of your awareness. A sound similar to your own scream.{/n}

languages.text: "Aber ich sehe, Ihr werdet schon bald eine sehr gehorsame Spezies sein. Krampfende Spasmen, hysterische Reaktionen ... Kommt her." {n}Als sich der dreieckige Fingernagel der Kreatur in deinen Rücken bohrt, durchdringt er mühelos deine Haut. Ein seltsames Geräusch pocht an den Rändern deines Bewusstseins. Ein Geräusch, das deinem Schrei ähnelt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But I see you will soon become a very obedient specimen. Convulsive spasms, hysterical reactions... Come here." {n}The creature pokes you in the chest, its triangular fingernail easily penetrating your skin. A strange sound throbs at the edge of your awareness. A sound similar to your own scream.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Aber ich sehe, Ihr werdet schon bald eine sehr gehorsame Spezies sein. Krampfende Spasmen, hysterische Reaktionen ... Kommt her." {n}Als sich der dreieckige Fingernagel der Kreatur in deinen Rücken bohrt, durchdringt er mühelos deine Haut. Ein seltsames Geräusch pocht an den Rändern deines Bewusstseins. Ein Geräusch, das deinem Schrei ähnelt.{/n}

languages.text: 「だが、お前はすぐに従順な標本となるだろう。痙攣、ヒステリー反応…さあ、来るがよい」{n}怪物はあなたの胸をつつくと、その三角形の爪はいとも簡単にあなたの肌を突き破った。あなたの意識の縁で、自分自身の悲鳴に似た奇妙な音が響いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But I see you will soon become a very obedient specimen. Convulsive spasms, hysterical reactions... Come here." {n}The creature pokes you in the chest, its triangular fingernail easily penetrating your skin. A strange sound throbs at the edge of your awareness. A sound similar to your own scream.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「だが、お前はすぐに従順な標本となるだろう。痙攣、ヒステリー反応…さあ、来るがよい」{n}怪物はあなたの胸をつつくと、その三角形の爪はいとも簡単にあなたの肌を突き破った。あなたの意識の縁で、自分自身の悲鳴に似た奇妙な音が響いた。{/n}

languages.text: “而我可以保证，你用不了多久就会变成非常听话的实验对象。抽搐、痉挛、歇斯底里的尖叫……让我看看吧。”{n}这只生物用手戳着你的胸口，它三角形的尖锐指甲轻而易举刺穿了你的皮肤。你听到意识边缘传来了古怪的声音，听起来像是你自己的放声尖叫。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But I see you will soon become a very obedient specimen. Convulsive spasms, hysterical reactions... Come here." {n}The creature pokes you in the chest, its triangular fingernail easily penetrating your skin. A strange sound throbs at the edge of your awareness. A sound similar to your own scream.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “而我可以保证，你用不了多久就会变成非常听话的实验样本。抽搐、痉挛、歇斯底里的尖叫……让我看看吧。”{n}这只生物用手戳着你的胸口，它三角形的尖锐指甲轻而易举刺穿了你的皮肤。你听到意识边缘传来了古怪的声音，听起来像是你自己的放声尖叫。{/n}

languages.text: «Pero veo que pronto serás un espécimen obediente. Espasmos convulsivos, reacciones histéricas... Ven aquí». {n}La criatura te da un toquecito en el pecho, atravesando tu piel con su uña triangular. Un extraño sonido vibra en los límites de tu conciencia. Te recuerda a tu propio grito.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But I see you will soon become a very obedient specimen. Convulsive spasms, hysterical reactions... Come here." {n}The creature pokes you in the chest, its triangular fingernail easily penetrating your skin. A strange sound throbs at the edge of your awareness. A sound similar to your own scream.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Pero veo que pronto serás un espécimen obediente. Espasmos convulsivos, reacciones histéricas... Ven aquí». {n}La criatura te da un toquecito en el pecho, atravesando tu piel con su uña triangular. Un extraño sonido vibra en los límites de tu conciencia. Te recuerda a tu propio grito.{/n}

languages.text: « Mais je vois d'ici que vous deviendrez bientôt un spécimen très obéissant. Spasmes convulsifs, réactions hystériques... Approchez un peu, pour voir. » {n}La créature vous plante un doigt dans la poitrine, et son ongle triangulaire pénètre vos chairs avec une aisance déconcertante. Un bruit étrange palpite à la périphérie de votre conscience, un bruit qui n'est pas sans évoquer votre propre cri.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But I see you will soon become a very obedient specimen. Convulsive spasms, hysterical reactions... Come here." {n}The creature pokes you in the chest, its triangular fingernail easily penetrating your skin. A strange sound throbs at the edge of your awareness. A sound similar to your own scream.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mais je vois d'ici que vous deviendrez bientôt un spécimen très obéissant. Spasmes convulsifs, réactions hystériques... Approchez un peu, pour voir. » {n}La créature vous plante un doigt dans la poitrine, et son ongle triangulaire pénètre vos chairs avec une aisance déconcertante. Un bruit étrange palpite à la périphérie de votre conscience, un bruit qui n'est pas sans évoquer votre propre cri.{/n}

languages.text: "Yakında son derece itaatkâr bir numune olacağını görebiliyorum. Sarsıntılı spazmlar, histerik tepkiler... Gel buraya." {n}Göğsünü dürten yaratığın üçgen tırnağı, kolaylıkla derini deliyor. Bilincinin en ücra noktalarında tuhaf, kendi çığlığına benzeyen bir ses zonkluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But I see you will soon become a very obedient specimen. Convulsive spasms, hysterical reactions... Come here." {n}The creature pokes you in the chest, its triangular fingernail easily penetrating your skin. A strange sound throbs at the edge of your awareness. A sound similar to your own scream.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ancak yakında son derece itaatkâr bir numune olacağını görebiliyorum. Sarsıntılı spazmlar, histerik tepkiler... Gel buraya." {n}Yaratık göğsünü dürtüyor, üçgen tırnağı derini kolaylıkla deliyor. Bilincinin en ücra noktalarında tuhaf bir ses zonkluyor. Kendi çığlığına benzeyen bir ses.{/n}
